name: Cat in a Croc
text: Bella seemed distracted, but you got all the features in. Great job!

name: Cat in a Croc
text: So, just a heads up..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: I have another friend of mine arriving here soon.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: They're not in the best mood right now..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: This cat is a huge foodie and someone accidentally bumpled into them..

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Aaand completely knocked all the food they were carrying home.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: It's all destroyed. They're ordering delivery now.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: They're trying to create a reliable food delivery website to avoid situations like these.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Sooo please be kind and patient. They might be ugly sobbing by the time they get here.

name: Cat in a Croc
text: Good luck! *poof*

name: Me
text: What?!

name: Me
text: (You hear ugly sobbing from the distance)

name: Me
text: Oh no.. that's gotta be them.

name: Me
text: (The ugly sobbing doesn't get any closer. It's.. louder.)

name: Me
text: I should go check up on them.

name: Me
text: (You find them on the floor looking into the distance)

name: Sobbing Cat
text: My.. my food *starts ugly sobbing again*

name: Me
text: Hey, your new food is on the way *pats back*

name: Sobbing Cat
text: Such a waaaaaaste of fooooood *ugly sobs some more*

name: Sobbing Cat
text: I need some *sniffle* help with my *sniffle* food delivery site.

name: Me
text: I know, I know. That's why I'm here.

name: Sobbing Cat
text: You're an angel *eyes full of tears*

name: Sobbing Cat
text: *hands over a dirty napkin that has writing of the features they want*

name: Sobbing Cat
text: *slowly gets up and starts walking away*

name: Me
text: Um, enjoy your food!
